body:
Comment 5 by **lucio.dere**: 
I have upgrade one installation of NetBSD (i386/32 bit) from 6.0 Beta 2 to 6.1.3
release.  The problem has gone away and I am pleased to report that Go build completes
successfully.  It makes me wonder if I shouldn't add this builder (a NetBSD VM on a
VMware ESXi 3.5 server) to the list of official builders.

Also, for those who may find this information useful, the problem was addressed as
explained in the following: <http://gnats.netbsd.org/47061>;. It may be easy for
someone with a source distribution to fix the problem locally.

I think this issue can be closed now.

Lucio.
